subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams won the Family Circle Cup title, defeating Vera Zvonareva, 6-4, 3-6, 6-3, for her first clay-court title since the 2002 French Open. Williams’s third title of the year was expected to lift her to No. 6 in the rankings. She is 19-1 this year.
